item.description:
What are your beliefs about money? Do you have limiting beliefs that are keeping you from making or enjoying money? How do you turn around these limiting beliefs? Phil will teach you how you can turn around these limiting beliefs by making a commitment to change them.

Phil will speak about The Principle of Success based on Jack Canfield's best-selling book by the same title. Anyone can achieve their financial goals with efficient planning and by applying the Principles.

Phil will be speaking about:

  • Recognizing your  limiting beliefs about money
  • Focus on what you want financially
  • Learn the financial principles of the wealthy
  • Find out how to be conscious about your money
  • Discover the value of giving back to others

Don't miss this exciting evening which is sure to change your beliefs about and send you on a path towards achieving financial abundance.

 

with love & gratitude

Ellen

Motivational Facilitator

617-750-4830
